projects.title: Blog App
projects.description: A web application that provides functionality to view posts, login/out, write posts to contribute to topics and leave comments on existing posts.

projects.title: Research Paper
projects.description: My research paper about the impact gossip magazines have on the iteration of internalised misogyny.

projects.title: Bookshelf App
projects.description: A web application that allows users to view available books, search for books by name, filter books by genre, view claimed books, claim a book, review books and even add new books to the system.

projects.title: Quiz API
projects.description: A quiz API that allows for a teacher to create quizzes to test their students. With functions that allow the teacher to add, edit and delete quizzes, questions and the relevant answers, view all quizzes and/or single quizzes and calculate quiz results from each student.
